maintainers.name: Roelof Wobben
maintainers.bio: A person who likes smalltalk very much and hopes more people enjoys the elegance of the language.

maintainers.name: Samuel Wilson
maintainers.bio: A Ruby on Rails dev by day, a Rust and Smalltalk programmer by night. I have found Pharo Smalltalk a delight to use. I'm here to spread the good news.

maintainers.name: Tim Mackinnon
maintainers.bio: I'm the co-inventor of Mock Objects, Gold Cards, and many retrospective techniques, but still a developer at heart and using Pharo Smalltalk as a platform to explore further new exciting ideas.

maintainers.name: J.R. "hiljusti" Hill
maintainers.bio: Build automation engineer at AWS by day, language enthusiast and tinkerer by night.
